page.title: 17SYMINGTON'S CUSTOMS 1985
page.content: In Symington village quite a few customs are kept up e.g.{GALA WEEK} occurs at the end of May each year. First of all the queen and 2 ladies in waiting are chosen from all the 12 year old girls in the village.This is what happened this year, Saturday: crowning + sale, Sunday:Sports Day, Monday:Junior Disco & Treasure Hunt, Tuesday:Pet Show, Wednesday:Fashion Show, Friday:Bingo, Saturday:Dance. {HALLOWEEN}is on 31st October and involves children dressing up and going round the doors performing party piece.Apples and sweets are given in return.{NEW YEAR'S EVE}is celebrated in Symington by people inviting their friends to toast in the New Year.{ {WEDDINGS}in Symington Church are usually followed by a Scramble which involves the bridegroom throwing coins to the children in the crowd.
